judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Peter J. Smith and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Fleming, Appellant.
Submitted November 15, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
Joel C. Meredith, for appellant.
Peter J. Smith and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1972:
